See also: partner

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Borrowed from English partner.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Partner m (genitive Partners, plural Partner, female Partnerin)

  1. partner, associate (male or of unspecified sex)

Declension[edit]

Declension of Partner
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinderPartnerdiePartner
genitiveeinesdesPartnersderPartner
dativeeinemdemPartnerdenPartnern
accusativeeinendenPartnerdiePartner
